issue.title: How to send float64 data to topic /srcsim/qual1/light ?

content.raw:
I'm not sure about C++, I've been using Python. Here is an example as to how you would send a message from the command line:

rostopic pub --once /srcsim/qual1/light srcsim/Console "{x: 10.0, y: 10.0, z: 10.0, r: 1.0, g: 0.0, b: 0.0}"

The [Qualification task 1 wiki](#!/osrf/srcsim/wiki/qual_task1) refers to the [message format](#!/osrf/srcsim/src/56895b58f7654df5a54934c562591020a558fde7/msg/Console.msg?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default).
content.html:
I'm not sure about C++, I've been using Python. Here is an example as to how you would send a message from the command line:

rostopic pub --once /srcsim/qual1/light srcsim/Console "{x: 10.0, y: 10.0, z: 10.0, r: 1.0, g: 0.0, b: 0.0}"

The Qualification task 1 wiki refers to the message format.
